description: Top notes of lavender and coriander.  Heart notes of orange flower.  Base notes of patchouli.

promotion: Introducing a limited edition version of the Gucci Guilty fragrance.  Inspired by the world of Alessandro Michele, this collector's edition is presented in a platinum-toned metal bottle with interlocking G design.
description: Top notes of geranium and pink pepper.  Heart notes of lilac and peach.  Base notes of amber and patchouli.
Top note of grapefruit.  Heart notes of cardamom and fig.  Base note of patchouli.  An aromatic citrus fragrance.
Top notes of pear, raspberry and saffron.  Heart notes of bulgarian rose and orange flower.  Base notes of natural uod oil and patchouli.
Top notes of bergamot.  Heart notes of casablanca lily and ylang ylang extra-comoros.  Base notes of sandalwood.
